javascript:!function(){var e={};e.copyToClipboard=void 0,e.copyToClipboard=function(o,e,n){var i;n&&((i=n.createElement("button")).setAttribute("style",["position: fixed","top: 0px","left: 0px","z-index: 99999","background: lightgreen","border: 2px solid black","border: color: black","letter-spacing: normal","word-spacing: normal","text-transform: none","text-indent: 0px","text-shadow: none","display: inline-block","text-align: center","cursor: default","box-sizing: border-box","margin: 0em","font: 400 20pt Arial"].join(";")),i.textContent=e,n.body.appendChild(i),i.onclick=function(){var e,t;"function"==typeof(null===(e=navigator.clipboard)||void 0===e?void 0:e.writeText)?navigator.clipboard.writeText(o).then(function(){console.log("Content copied to clipboard")},function(){console.log("Failed to copy content to clipboard")}):(console.log("Attempting old-school copy"),(t=n.createElement("textarea")).setAttribute("style","width: 0px; height:0px"),n.body.appendChild(t),t.value=o,setTimeout(function(){t.select(),t.setSelectionRange(0,99999),n.execCommand("copy"),n.body.removeChild(t)},1)),n.body.removeChild(i)})};for(var t=document.title.replace(/[\|\[\(\]\)]/g," ").replace(/\s+/g," ").trim(),o=document.location.href,n=(document.querySelector("h1"),document.querySelector("h2"),""),i=0,r=["h1 ~ p","h1 ~ * p","h2 ~ p","h2 ~ * p"];i<r.length;i++){var l=r[i],c=document.querySelector(l);if(c&&c.textContent&&10<c.textContent.length){n=c.textContent.replace(/\s+/g," ").trim().substring(0,255);break}}var a=new Date,d=a.getTimezoneOffset(),p=(a=new Date(a.getTime()-60*d*1e3)).toISOString().split("T")[0],b=n?"  \n> "+n:"";e.copyToClipboard("- "+p+" ["+t+"]("+o+")"+b+"\n","Copy Page URL to Clipboard",document)}();
